content:
That's a great idea! Watching live videos of these bands will definitely give you a sense of their energy and performance style. Snarky Puppy and Lettuce are both known for their incredible live shows, and they have a lot of great live videos available online.

Snarky Puppy, in particular, has a fantastic YouTube channel with a ton of live videos from their performances around the world. They're known for their dynamic, improvisational live shows, and their videos really capture the energy and excitement of their performances.

Lettuce also has a lot of great live videos available, including some amazing performances from festivals like Jam Cruise and Bear Creek. They're known for their funky, high-energy live shows, and their videos are a lot of fun to watch.

Additionally, you might want to check out some of the live music platforms like NPR's Tiny Desk Concerts, Live from the Village Vanguard, or Jazz at Lincoln Center's Live from the Appel Room. These platforms often feature live performances from a wide range of jazz and funk artists, and they can be a great way to discover new music and get a sense of an artist's live performance style.

Remember, live music is all about the energy and connection between the musicians and the audience, so watching live videos can be a great way to get a feel for that energy and excitement. I hope you enjoy exploring these videos and discovering some new music!
